prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with fluffy white feathers and a strong beak.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a small eagle, complete with blue and red accents.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that loves to soar through the skies and hunt in forests.
Show me a cute yet fierce Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a young raptor.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique feather pattern, showcasing a mix of white and blue.
Make a Pokemon that stands out with its round body and energetic personality.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that inspires bravery and loyalty in its trainers.
